this_title: Rita Moreno: Just a Girl Who Decided to Go for It
trans_title: 丽塔·莫雷诺：一个决定追逐梦想的女孩
Rita Moreno: The Girl Who Decided to Go for It
introduction: Talented, energetic, and full of joy, Rita Moreno has been dazzling audiences for over 70 years. Whether showcased on television, film, or stage, her artistry transcends singing, dancing, and acting, as she continuously reinvents herself and pushes creative limits. Moreno is a pioneer and one of the most authentic performers of our time, and she has the EGOT status to prove it.
chinese_title: 丽塔·莫雷诺：一个决定追逐梦想的女孩
foreign_title: Rita Moreno: Just a Girl Who Decided to Go for It
